profile.rationale: The job ad focuses on developing AI-driven solutions, specifically mentioning LLM outputs and optimizing AI models (Macro-Category B, GenAI Specialization). It also includes tasks like transforming prototypes into functional solutions and collaborating in Agile cycles (Macro-Category A, Software Development & Integration). The emphasis on LLM outputs and AI model optimization, combined with software development aspects, points towards a balanced role with a clear focus on Generative AI, fitting the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI model development and optimization, as well as software development practices. The mention of 'LLM outputs' specifically points to Generative AI. While it doesn't explicitly list GenAI frameworks or tools, the tasks are strongly indicative of a GenAI role. The confidence is high, but not a perfect 5, due to the absence of specific GenAI tool mentions.
